snippet: An Illinois man accused of killing eight people in Illinois and Missouri in 2008 was found guilty on Tuesday in the death of one of them.
abstract: Nicholas Sheley, Illinois man accused of killing eight people in Illinois and Missouri in 2008, is found guilty in death of one of them in Sterling, Ill.
lead_paragraph: An Illinois man accused of killing eight people in Illinois and Missouri in 2008 was found guilty on Tuesday in the death of one of them.
